resources.string:
Hi, my name is Alessandro aka Zukka

I love coding
I like to eat Pizza and beer 

Now I'm studing on Udacity for Android Kotlin Developer Nanodegree 

I am a mobile developer for patente dot it
 and every day I write some code in Xamarin 

I hope to become a better developer and I study every day to improve my skills 

I live in the north of Italy 
I love Ireland and Bushmill 
I 'm married with Tania and I have two children, Matteo and Marco.
